nodes.text: This unidentified organization was active while the Imperial prison barge Purge was in service with Zahara Cody as its chief medical officer. Zahara's father, Teef Lan Cody, was aware of the organization and his child decided to join it.
The name of this organization was redacted from the text of one of the in-universe letters that made up Death Troopers: Recovered Messages from Purge, a tie-in to the novel Death Troopers.
